overview:
Paul is a technology PR specialist with a decade of experience who has led UK and international campaigns for clients including household names, Tech Track 100 companies and smaller start-ups.

A regular commenter on all things PR via the Berkeley PR blog, his own blog and a variety of different media, he has a passion for anything related to digital communication techniques and how clients can get the most out of these mediums.

Paul is involved on a day to day basis with all his clients and provides strategic direction and planning to all his accounts.

“The internet and social media are slowly changing the face of the traditional media. There are now so many different ways for companies to communicate with their audience. From paper-based titles, websites and blogs, to a business’s own blog and social networking presence, making sure the right message is presented is vital. We help our clients to make sure they are getting the most out of the media.”

He is also an avid football fan — don’t get him started — and enjoys live music and trying something new for the first time.
